summary.para: Retrieves the property name, operation, and value from a leaf search condition node.

param.name: ppropkey
param.para: Receives the name of the property of the leaf condition as a PROPERTYKEY.

param.name: pcop
param.para: Receives the operation of the leaf condition as a enumeration.

param.name: ppropvar
param.para: Receives the property value of the leaf condition as a .

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, E_FAIL if this is not a leaf node, or an error value otherwise.

remarks.para: Any or all of the three parameters can be NULL.
The StructuredQuerySample demonstrates how to read lines from the console, parse them using the system schema, and display the resulting condition trees.
